transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji, namaskar.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Namaskar.
Customer: Haan ji, namaskar sir.
Executive: Namaskar, namaskar. Bilkul theek, aap bataiye. 
Customer: Haan sir, Jakha Ford se.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan sir.
Customer: Jakha Ford se bol raha hu.
Executive: Haan, haan pata hai sir, Jakha Ford se baat kar rahe hain. Kaise ho aap?
Customer: Ji, main theek hai badhiya. Main ye chah raha tha ki mera abhi maine na spare part ka kaam shuru kiya hai iska. 
Executive: Achha. Ab iska. 
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: To main ek alag profile banana chah raha tha.
Executive: Achha. Kya hoga vo?
Executive: Uske liye naya GST?
Customer: Naya GST? Naya GST hai?
Customer: Nahi, usi GST number yahi rahega.
Customer: Haan, nahi main ye chah raha tha dekhiye, harvester mein aur harvester parts mein, parts mein kya hai bahut saari inquiry hai na. 
Executive: Bilkul.
Customer: Usko kaise, haan usko apan kaise maintain karenge ye main chah raha tha.
Executive: Ab sir dekho, agar aap isi mein add karwaoge, to ek demo ke liye, dekho jo main as a personal suggest karunga, ki thoda zyada aapka amount na fase ya koi cheez nayi mein jaoge, naya GST lagana padega, hai na? Fir naya package kharidna padega. Usse achha ek baar isme ek kaam karo, do-char product add karo. Apne harvester mein, batana zara product. Ek baar usme dekho kitne hain. 
Customer: Harvester spare parts hai.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye.
Executive: Harvester spare parts?
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Ek minute, ek minute.

Executive: Ek minute sir line par rehna dekh raha hu.
Executive: To isme jitne bhi spare part aate hain saare?
Customer: Haan saare.
Executive: Ek minute sir. Combine harvester na?
Customer: Haan combine harvester ke spare part. Chahe to vo ek bulk mein bhi ho sakta hai, vo inquiry lega, fir usme se samaan jo hai vo matlab hamara number ya usme. 
Executive: Bilkul. Mere paas ek category hai harvester parts ki, ek hai harvester blade ki, uske baad tractor linkage part hai, tractor replacement part hai, ye sab to apne kaam ka hai nahi?
Customer: Nahi, apne paas to harvester spare parts hai.
Executive: Dekho, apne paas harvester ki ek category hai, harvester parts ki, harvester blade ki. To ye dono cheeze apne paas.
Customer: Haan ye dono cheeze apne paas.
Executive: To agar harvester part mein dekho na sir, to harvester part mein ek Indore se hi hai. 
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Agar aapko batau main, to ye Front Crew Technologies Private Limited. 
Customer: Theek hai na, honge na honge.
Executive: Ji, Krishi Kit, Krishi Kit for harvester and tractor bech rahe hain. 
Customer: Haan honge honge na. Theek hai. India Mart to apan bhi chahte hain ki apna dikhne lage.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye, main abhi on the call hi main add kar de raha hu, ek minute line par raho. Aap apni taraf se usme photo add kar dena.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye. Aur sir ye apna harvester ka kaam kaise aa raha hai?
Customer: Theek hai sir, badhiya aa raha hai.
Executive: Sahi chal raha hai?
Customer: Badhiya, badhiya. India Mart to badhiya zindabad. Sab hum India Mart se hi uthate hain apan. 
Executive: Nahi nahi sir, aisa thodi hai sir, apna aap vo bhi to kar hi rahe hoge sir, offline to zyada hi aata hoga sir.
Customer: Haan vo alag baat hai lekin India Mart mein hum ye chahte hain jaise hum isme chate hain aapko hum har inquiry ko pakadte hain aur pehchan lete hain ki ye sahi hai ki nahi hai.
Executive: Vo to aapko time ke sath aa gaya hai pura. 
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Aap to itne time se use kar rahe ho sir, ab to pura aapko pata hi hai sir, kaun se pe kitne kis tarike se nikalni hai. Starting mein thodi bahut problem rehti hai, lekin vo bhi with time sahi ho jati hai. Main ek product kis naam se add karu sir? Ek combine harvester spare part se add kar de raha hu. 
Customer: Haan. Theek hai. 
Executive: Aur dusra kis naam se karu?
Customer: Harvester spare, spare part ye aa raha hai kya?
Executive: Ek minute rukiye. Kya hai ki kisan jo hai na vo harvester bhi dal deta hai, harvester parts aisa kuch dal deta hai. Usko kya combine harvester. 
Executive: Main main saare, main dekho main yaha pe teen product add karunga, theek hai? 
Customer: Ji, ji, ji. 
Executive: Aur teen product jo add karunga vo sabka naam alag alag karunga. Jaise ek ho gaya combine harvester spare parts. Price kya hai? Haan. Price kya hai?
Customer: To price to alag alag dal de, kuch bhi dal de isme abhi to.
Executive: Price aap khud se dal dena. Khud se dal dunga. Kya hai ki koi koi part hota hai 10 ka koi hota hai 10000 ka. Ye part ka, part ka dekho ab isme mere paas yaha pe available nau part hai sir. Harvester finger, harvester blade, harvester knife, harvester patti, saw reaper blade head, paddy cutter, finger guard, disc harrow axle aur harvester thresher spike tooth. Mere paas nau product hai yaha pe. Chaliye ye dal dijiye aap. Ab ye bataiye isme se pehla product bataiye kya add karu?
Customer: Haan na. Harvester finger pehla kuch bhi. Harvester finger dal du?
Customer: Harvester finger, haan dal sakte ho.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye.
Executive: Aap kaam karte ho na harvester finger mein?
Customer: Ji, ji karte hain na sab sab harvester ka pura samaan bech rahe hain. Ek minute rukiye. Finger bhi hai ye jo nau naam bole ye nau ke alava bhi pura samaan bechte bearing-vering jo aati hai. 
Executive: Iske alava bhi bechte ho?
Customer: Haan iske alava harvester ka pura samaan hota hai. Hazaro item hote hain. 
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Hai na? To kya hua ki aadmi harvester parts dhoondhega. Jaise parts mein combine harvester mein jayega vo mere paas message aa jayega aapke paas. Fir main usse baat karke usko kya chahiye vo main usse consult kar lunga. 
Executive: Dekho sir, main aapko bas ek kaam karna hai jo bhi maine naam bataya na, hmm, bas usi, usi naam se aapko saare jo hai aage aage add karne hain. Aap add kar dena. Uske baad mujhe call karna mera number likh lo. Is number pe, is number pe kam kiya karo. Mera personal number likh lo, main hi aapka account handle karta hu.
Executive: Alankrit bol raha hai kya?
Executive: Ji, ji.
Customer: Haan Alankrit bolo.
Executive: Ji vahi product add karna tha na harvester part wale, vahi sir ko bata raha tha. Ek product maine harvester finger wala, ek product maine harvester finger ka add kar diya hai.
Customer: Achha, achha, achha.
Executive: Theek hai? Baki, baki ab uske alava bache spare parts ka ek pura category bana do na ek spare parts mein hi kya karna hai. 
Executive: Haan haan vahi vahi spare, vahi kar raha tha main, vahi kar raha tha. Ab jaise ek finger ka bana diya hai. Ab finger mein maine ek aapki category harvester finger add kar diya hai. 
Customer: Jaise kya ho raha hai Alankrit ji, hamare na aas paas mein jaise hi log harvester spare parts dukan search kar rahe hain na, usme hum nahi dikh rahe hain. Hai na? Haan usme hum nahi dikh rahe hain. Usme ye nahi search kar raha ki finger ka finger kahan par milega. Ye nahi search kar raha hai ki saat kahan milegi. Vo usme harvester spare parts ki dukan ye wali. 
Executive: Haan to maine harvester spare parts bhi add kiya hai sir. Maine maine dono cheez kari hai. Maine harvester spare parts bhi add kar diya hai. Aur dekho ab koi agar specific dhoondh raha hai. Ab ye to the jinhone specific nahi dhoondha, vo sirf dhoondh rahe the. Hai na? To vo ye is tarike se aa gaye. Ab koi aadmi hai jo ekdam specific dhoondh raha hai. To uske liye aap harvester finger nau product jaise jitne bhi spare parts hote hain. 
Customer: Problem ye bhi hai ki thoda sa jaz dial apan se upar aata hai is wale case mein. 
Executive: Kya harvester spare parts mein? Spare parts harvester spare parts jaise hi koi search karta hai na usme jaz dial upar aata hai. Hamare area mein aaju baju ke jitne jile hain sab jagah aata hai. Vo vo is vajah se hai, kyunki hamara jo account hai na usme spare part ki ek bhi category hi nahi add hai. Hamare paas main kaam karne wali abhi combine harvester hai, harvester hai, aur preet combine harvester hai main aur ek mini harvester hai. Ye char category hai, char keyword hai jispe aap main kaam kar rahe ho aur abhi maine aapki harvester part ki add kari hai aur harvester finger ki. Ye abhi maine sirf add kari hai kyunki iski lead aapne consume kari thi. To abhi with time aap jaise jaise istemal karoge isko aapka page vo jaz dial ke upar aana fir se shuru ho jayega. Jaise harvester mein sabse upar aata hai, vaise hi spare part mein bhi upar aane lagega. To koi issue ki baat nahi hai. Theek hai. Theek hai, main add karte jaate hain to usme aane lagega. 
Executive: Haan dekho maine ek add kar diya hai. Usi tarike se add karte rehna bas jo naam hoga.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to create a separate profile.

- Wants to know how to maintain inquiries.

- Not visible when searching for spare parts.



Resolution:

- Suggested adding products to current profile.

- Executive added harvester spare parts.

- Executive added harvester finger.

- Explained how to add more products.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will add more products.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- spare parts, harvester, profile, gst, products
